aboutMeSection.aboutMeText:
Hi there! I'm Marco, a frontend developer passionate about creating intuitive and efficient digital experiences. With a natural problem-solving mindset and a keen eye for detail, I specialize in transforming complex concepts into visually appealing and functional web solutions.

Let’s collaborate and build something remarkable together!

skillSection.skillsIntroductionText: I have gained experience in building projects with a variety of frontend technologies and concepts. With a strong growth mindset, I’m always exploring new areas to enhance my skill set.

feedbackSection.feedbackText2: Karl really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.
feedbackSection.feedbackText3: Karl really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.Karl really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.

contactMeSection.contactMeText:
Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
Feel free to get in touch with your project details. I'd love the opportunity to help create a website that meets your needs!
contactMeSection.errorTextName: Oops! It seems your name is missing?
contactMeSection.placeholderMessage: Hello Marco, I am interested in ...
contactMeSection.errorTextMessage: What do you need to develop?
contactMeSection.privacyPolicyPart2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
